verbs.description: it not illegal to [V: get] [ARG1: a free rideshare] [ARG2: to the ballot box] utah elections office rules the utah state elections office has ruled it is not illegal to get a free rideshare to go vote lyft was offering free rides and uber was offering discounted rides to the ballot box on election day to encourage people to vote but it was n't available in utah uber lyft utah state elections office fox pitt kelton cochran caronia waller utah united states postal service fox elections justin lee american civil liberties union salt lake city
